titles.title: Senior Prescription Drug Assistance Expansion Demonstration Act of 1999
To authorize a demonstration project to expand eligibility under existing State prescription drug assistance programs for low-income seniors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 6/29/1999--Introduced. Senior Prescription Drug Assistance Expansion Demonstration Act of 1999 - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide for a two-year demonstration project for qualified States to expand eligibility under existing State low-income senior prescription drug assistance programs. Authorizes appropriations.
